attributes.action: Fund free monthly credit reports for 25M people who's personal information lost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the government should fund free monthly credit reports for the 25m people affected by the lost Child Benefit records fiasco to enable monitoring of potential fraudulent use of said information. This funding to be available for a period of not less than 5 years.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
